Uses of Class
org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.PAssert.SingletonAssert

  • Packages that use PAssert.SingletonAssert 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.testing
    Defines utilities for unit testing Dataflow pipelines.

    • Uses of PAssert.SingletonAssert in org.apache.beam.sdk.testing

      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.testing that return PAssert.SingletonAssert 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.SingletonAssert.is(T expectedValue)
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by isEqualTo(T)
      PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.SingletonAssert.isEqualTo(T expectedValue)
      Checks that the value of this SingletonAssert's view is equal to the expected value.
      PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.SingletonAssert.notEqualTo(T expectedValue)
      Checks that the value of this SingletonAssert's view is not equal to the expected value.
      PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.SingletonAssert.satisfies(org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.PAssert.AssertRelation<T,T> relation, T expectedValue)
      Applies an AssertRelation to check the provided relation against the value of this assert and the provided expected value.
      PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.SingletonAssert.satisfies(SerializableFunction<T,Void> checkerFn)
      Applies a SerializableFunction to check the value of this SingletonAssert's view.
      PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.SingletonAssert.setCoder(Coder<T> coderOrNull)
      Sets the coder to use for elements of type T, as needed for internal purposes.
      static <K,V> PAssert.SingletonAssert<Map<K,V>> PAssert.thatMap(PCollection<KV<K,V>> actual)
      Constructs a PAssert.SingletonAssert for the value of the provided PCollection, which must have at most one value per key.
      static <K,V> PAssert.SingletonAssert<Map<K,Iterable<V>>> PAssert.thatMultimap(PCollection<KV<K,V>> actual)
      Constructs a PAssert.SingletonAssert for the value of the provided PCollection.
      static <T> PAssert.SingletonAssert<T> PAssert.thatSingleton(PCollection<T> actual)
      Constructs a PAssert.SingletonAssert for the value of the provided PCollection PCollection<T>, which must be a singleton.
